title: Battle Boss missions
body: Are there any more missions expect those 8 ? Refering to battle boss event . The last 2 I've had were "win a game with blitz in either team/win a game with veigar in either team". Those were for 40 tickets and I ve finished them yesterday and I was wondering if i am going to recieve any more quests ?

replies.body: Actually if you look at the rewards for buying a dungeon pass you gain access to the Brand, Malzahar, and Ziggs mission lines. So I expect there will be more missions later today.

> [{quoted}](name=The Salt Lord,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UpbBk0WV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-13T14:20:16.564+0000)
>
> Actually if you look at the rewards for buying a dungeon pass you gain access to the Brand, Malzahar, and Ziggs mission lines. So I expect there will be more missions later today.

I think one of the rioter said that the missions are resetting every 11:00am local time, but now its 7:00pm and still didnt get it, from yesterday my mission box was empty.
*Daily* missions should be resetting each day, not every mission will reset. You can gain access to the bonus 3 mission lines and daily missions by purchasing the Dungeon Pass.

If it's anything like the Yas/Riven missions they should refresh at about 2:30. I, too finished all the missions and you only got 200 tickets which isn't enough to get that much... if they don't have more missions I'll be disappointed. Then again, they're probably gonna have more missions when the Star Guardian skins release.
Me too, completed them yesterday and didnt received new ones.
